name: the great reset
description:
digital painting combined with procedural experiments,
this work comes from the collaboration between the painter and crypto atrista Ali the Great and Mr. Broke.

our world is changing rapidly and the great reset of the economic world is taking place, we as observers are divided between a dark and dystopian future and a global reorganization towards green policies and the interconnected world of digital.

There is an urgent need for global stakeholders to cooperate in simultaneously managing the direct consequences of the COVID-19 crisis. To improve the state of the world, the World Economic Forum is starting The Great Reset initiative.
